snippet: At the Tradewise Gibraltar Chess Festival, Hou Yifan defeated Judit Polgar, who has been No. 1 longer than Hou has been alive.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that Judit Polgar has been ranked No.1 women's player for 20 years, but that her dominance is being threatened by 17-year-old women's world champion Hou Yifan, who defeated Polgar with a spectacular performance at the Tradewise Gibraltar Chess Festival.
lead_paragraph: At the Tradewise Gibraltar Chess Festival, Hou Yifan defeated Judit Polgar, who has been No. 1 longer than Hou has been alive.

headline.seo: Hou Yifan Defeats Judit Polgar at Gibraltar Chess Festival
headline.main: 17-Year-Old’s Victory Puts Pressure on Best Woman Ever to Play the Game
headline.print_headline: 17-Year-Old’s Victory Puts Pressure On Best Woman Ever to Play the Game
